title: Tom Holland - In the Shadow of the Sword
description:
In the Shadow of the Sword: The Birth of Islam and the Rise of the Global Arab Empire by Tom Holland



A thrillingly panoramic and incredibly timely account of the rise of Islam, from the acclaimed author of Rubicon and Persian Fire.
 
The evolution of the Arab empire is one of the supreme narratives of ancient history, a story dazzlingly rich in drama, character, and achievement. In this exciting and sweeping historyÃ¢â‚¬â€the third in his trilogy of books on the ancient worldÃ¢â‚¬â€Holland describes how the Arabs emerged to carve out a stupefyingly vast dominion in a matter of decades, overcoming seemingly insuperable odds to create an imperial civilization aspects of which endure to the present day. With profound bearing on the most consequential events of our time, Holland ties the exciting story of IslamÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s ascent to the crises and controversies of the present.
